data.lyric:
[ti:A Holly Jolly Christmas]
[ar:Burl Ives]
[al:100 Essential Christmas Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Holly Jolly Christmas (快乐圣诞) (Single Version) - Burl Ives (伯尔·艾夫斯)
[00:13.94]Have a holly  jolly Christmas
[00:17.17]It's the best time of the year
[00:20.88]I don't know if there'll be snow
[00:24.83]But have a cup of cheer
[00:27.49]Have a holly  jolly Christmas
[00:29.68]
[00:30.69]And when you walk down the street
[00:34.48]Say hello to friends you know
[00:37.74]And everyone you meet
[00:41.23]Oh  ho the mistletoe
[00:44.63]Hung where you can see
[00:48.00]Somebody waits for you
[00:51.33]Kiss her once for me
[00:54.43]Have a holly  jolly Christmas
[00:57.76]And in case you didn't hear
[01:01.51]Oh by golly have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:05.80]This year
[01:07.48]
[01:08.04]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:11.37]It's the best time of the year
[01:13.91]
[01:21.86]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:24.81]And when you walk down the street
[01:28.66]Say hello to friends you know
[01:31.89]And everyone you meet
[01:34.85]Oh  ho  the mistletoe
[01:38.69]Hung where you can see
[01:42.03]Somebody waits for you
[01:45.38]Kiss her once for me
[01:48.53]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:51.60]And in case you didn't hear
[01:55.42]Oh  by golly
[01:56.90]Have a holly jolly Christmas this year
data.trans:
[ti:A Holly Jolly Christmas]
[ar:Burl Ives]
[al:100 Essential Christmas Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:13.94]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[00:17.17]这是一年中最美好的时候
[00:20.88]我不知道是否会下雪
[00:24.83]但是，我们会一起欢呼
[00:27.49]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[00:29.68]
[00:30.69]当你走到街上
[00:34.48]和你朋友
[00:37.74]和你遇见的人，互相问好
[00:41.23]哦，哦，槲寄生树枝
[00:44.63]随处可见
[00:48.00]有人在等你
[00:51.33]替我吻她一下吧
[00:54.43]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[00:57.76]如果你没有听见，我再说一遍
[01:01.51]哦，天啊，让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[01:05.80]今年
[01:07.48]
[01:08.04]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[01:11.37]这是一年中最美好的时候
[01:13.91]
[01:21.86]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[01:24.81]当你走到街上
[01:28.66]和你朋友
[01:31.89]和你遇见的人，互相问好
[01:34.85]哦，哦，槲寄生树枝
[01:38.69]随处可见
[01:42.03]有人在等你
[01:45.38]替我吻她一下吧
[01:48.53]让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[01:51.60]如果你没有听见，我再说一遍
[01:55.42]哦，天啊
[01:56.90]今年，让我们快快乐乐地过个圣诞节
[02:00.91]
